info.name: Selldo API Documentation
info.description: This Documentation contains the API for Lead Creation and related activities to be performed on the lead created in Sell.Do.

item.name: Lead

request.description:
This API is used to **Create** **a New Lead** in Sell.Do.

| **Field** | **Data Type** | **Possible Values** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| first_name | String |  | Lead will be created in Sell.Do with the given First Name. |
| last_name | String |  | Lead will be created in Sell.Do with the given Last Name. |
| email\* |  |  |  |
| phone\* |  |  |  |
| salutation |  |  |  |
| time_zone |  |  |  |
| user_created_tags |  |  |  |
| stage |  |  |  |
| status |  |  |  |
| nri |  |  |  |
| project_id |  |  |  |
| campaign_id |  |  |  |
| sales |  |  |  |
| profile\[company\] |  |  |  |
| channel_partner_id |  |  |  |
| note\[content\] |  |  |  |
| requirement\[bhk\] |  |  |  |
| property_type |  |  |  |
| purpose |  |  |  |
| locations |  |  |  |
| min_budget |  |  |  |
| max_budget |  |  |  |
| min_possession |  |  |  |
| max_possession |  |  |  |
| facing |  |  |  |
| furnishing |  |  |  |
| bathrooms |  |  |  |
| funding_source |  |  |  |
| transaction_type |  |  |  |
| area |  |  |  |
| addresses_fields |  |  |  |
| api_key |  |  | add website restricted api_key |

response.name: Error response if not added Mandatory fields
response.body: {"sell_do_lead_id":"","sell_do_lead_verified":"","error":["The email and phone number are not found/valid"],"selldo_lead_details":{"lead_already_exists":false,"lead_created_at":null,"exists_by":"","stage":null,"stage_changed_on":null,"last_sv_conducted_on":null,"last_campaign_created_at":null,"stage_data":{"id":null,"value":null}}}

request.description:
This API is used to **Update** data on an existing lead in Sell.Do

| **Field** | **Data Type** | **Possible Values** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| api_key |  |  | add website_full_access_api_key |
| client_id |  |  |  |
| lead |  |  | For lead related field details please refer Lead create Api document. |
| lead.lead_profile.gender |  |  |  |
| lead.lead_profile.married |  |  |  |
| lead.lead_profile.anniversary |  |  |  |
| lead.lead_profile.age |  |  |  |
| lead.lead_profile.birthday |  |  |  |
| lead.lead_profile.industry |  |  |  |
| lead.lead_profile.urls |  |  |  |
| lead.lead_profile.incomes |  |  |  |
| lead.lead_profile.loan_details |  |  |  |
| lead.lead_profile.educational_details |  |  |  |
| lead.lead_profile.professional_details |  |  |  |
| currently_in |  |  |  |
| push_to_sales |  |  |  |
| team_id |  |  |  |

request.description: This API is used to **Retrieve** lead related data from the database in Sell.Do.

item.description: This API is used to **Create/Update/Retrieve** a lead in Sell.do.

item.name: Followup

request.description:
This API is used to **Schedule a Follow-up** for a lead in Sell.Do.

| **Field** | **Data Type** | **Possible Values** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| api_key |  |  | Add website full access api key. |
| client_id |  |  |  |
| followup.followup_type |  |  |  |
| followup.lead_id |  |  | Add lead Database id. |
| followup.scheduled_on |  |  |  |
| followup.status |  |  |  |
| followup.subject |  |  |  |
| followup.agenda |  |  |  |
